NO. CAAP-17-0000529 Intermediate Court of Appeals of Hawai'i. August 30, 2019.

In the MATTER OF the ARBITRATION BETWEEN UNITED PUBLIC WORKERS, AFSCME, LOCAL 646, AFL-CIO, Union-Appellant-Appellant,
and
State, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, HIGHWAYS DIVISION, Hilo Baseyard (Griev. of Elgin Santos re: Promotion); Sections 1, 14, 16, 64 and 66; AN-15-04 (2016-011), Employer-Appellee-Appellee

SUMMARY DISPOSITION ORDER

Affirmed.
